text: Stephen Sik-Sang Yau is an American computer scientist. He is a professor of Computer Science and Engineering at Arizona State University. He is an Elected Fellow of the American Association for the Advancement of Science and Life Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:American computer scientists Category:Arizona State University faculty Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Fellows of the American Association for the Advancement of Science
title: Stephen Sik-Sang Yau
